name: Aviva Threading Salon

Review 1: Very nice lady , efficient and definitely knows what she is doing. I loved how my eyebrows turned out, will be going back soon
Review 2: I was visiting Providence and Newport and decided to get my eyebrows threaded since I didn‚Äôt have a chance before leaving on vacation. This was such a great experience in a beautiful and clean environment. The prices were more than reasonable and I will definitely frequent again on my next trip to Providence.
Review 3: Can‚Äôt rave enough about this establishment. Very friendly, warm owner who goes above and beyond to listen to you and deliver. I honestly came here not knowing what to expect and she comforted me well. My eyebrow came out sharp and full just how I like them. My lip and chin were done perfect and with great ease. Thread is high quality and the salon is clean. It smells good in there:)
Review 4: I get Male eyebrow threading here. Owner operated. Same women every single time you come back. Great prices. BEST SERVICE!!
Review 5: Very nice shop. The lady there always does extremely thorough cleaning and shapes my eyebrow so nicely. My eyebrow and upper lip looks so good when done. She is the only one I trust my eyebrow with. Highly recommend

name: Neelu's Eyebrow Threading
working_hours: Monday: 10 AM-8 PM, Tuesday: 10 AM-8 PM, Wednesday: 10 AM-8 PM, Thursday: 10 AM-8 PM, Friday: 10 AM-8 PM, Saturday: 10 AM-8 PM, Sunday: 10 AM-8 PM
Review 1: I liked the results of my eyebrows once they were done, but the attitude given to me was terribly unpleasant and unprofessional. The eye rolls, scoffs, and dirty looks were unnecessary. She then began to get pushy, even though I had said it was my first time. She crossed the line when she began pushing my head back and aggressively rearranging my hands to hold up the skin, where she was threading. She made my experience unpleasant and humiliating. Beware they are not afraid to rip the skin off your face if they don‚Äôt like you. I recommend that you teach your employees how to communicate with your customers better.
Review 2: The lady (I forgot her name unfortunately) was extremely nice the first time I went here. I was with a group of friends and she offered us free Henna because we couldn't afford it at the time. She was very nice, but very pushy. I understand that it's good to try to be pushy in business, but she crossed the line a bit. Overall, it was a pretty good experience the first time, but the second time wasn't really. We couldn't decide if we wanted to get our upper lips waxed (me and my friend) and my other friend wanted an eyebrow threading. We were sitting on the couches in front when they lady said to come to the back room with her because she wanted to show us something. We said okay although we were confused as to what she wanted to show us. She took us back and then said "Who's first". At this point we felt we didn't have a choice although we were very nervous to do this. We told her it was our first time and she tried to comfort us, but in a very pushy way. When it was my turn to go she started immediately (I was not ready). I kept moving because I was extremely nervous and she told me to stop, but didn't give me a chance to. When she did wax my upper lip she didn't get all of it and left remnants at the top. I wish I could have given a better review, this is just my opinion of the experience.
Review 3: My first time going there was an okay experience, this lady was tall and she did an okay job with my brows. She took a decent amount of time doing each brow. I then went to go the second time, I didn‚Äôt have the same lady, this lady was much shorter, first off I was waiting out of the store, she saw me through the reflection of the mirror, but didn‚Äôt seated me because she was ON THE PHONE. Five minutes went by and she seating me, then I saw her put on her airpods, so clearly she was on a call while doing my brows. I told her I wanted cleaning no shape nothing! She did the complete opposite! She ruined my brows! My brows used to be super thick and now they are super thin!! She also did both of my brows under 10 minutes! Worst service, highly unprofessional! I literally cried when I went home. I still paid but it wasn‚Äôt worth it. Ladies don‚Äôt go here!!!  If y‚Äôall have thick brows this isn‚Äôt the place for you!
Review 4: I left a review on this site about 6-7 months ago speaking about employees charging me extra and taking tips. On their site it is listed as $10. They charge me $12 and whenever I had cash, usually a $20, they would give me $7 back, they stole extra money from me every time. November 27th, an employee came up to me, questioned me about my review and made me change my review. She was extremely rude and she straight up ambushed me. I've gone to this place for years and I felt so disrespected. Upon speaking to her I felt ambushed, and she forced me to delete my review. She was pushy and told me to lie and say that they give good service. Never again.
Review 5: I went for upper lips and the girl name SABINA is super rude and always give me a  bad look .I never go to her. But the day I went she took me for upper lips and when I told her, that my upper lips is not clean properly, she got frustrated on me and started yelling at me and keep telling me bad stuff. Who does treat there customer's like this?? I have seen SABINA and other  girls making fun of  customer's and talk in there own Nepali language. Very unprofessional staff specifically SABINA. She thinks she owns the place and she is the boss. Lots of customers have complained, but I guess the owner Neelu does not care. Please guys do not go the girl SABINA. Neelu if you really care about your customers then you need to talk to SABINA. Being rude to customers is not going to help her neither you. Respect your customers and stop making fun and speaking in your native language in front of your customer. Guys be aware about this place. Hope some action being taken against SABINA.

name: Salon Thread
working_hours: Monday: 10 AM-7 PM, Tuesday: 10 AM-7 PM, Wednesday: 10 AM-7 PM, Thursday: 10 AM-7 PM, Friday: 10 AM-7 PM, Saturday: 10 AM-7 PM, Sunday: 10 AM-5 PM
Review 1: I had a membership which was great up until I needed to cancel it. I was moving out of state so I cancelled online ahead of time- but I was charged for the month. I decided to take the loss and go in one more time and informed them that I wanted to cancel due to me moving. I was told to email someone to cancel which I did immediately. The following month my card was charged again. I contacted every single location and told them I have cancelled online and emailed and they all told me that emailing was the best way to cancel. I contacted my bank at this point because it had been over a month of emailing and cancelling online and getting the run around with calling each location. My bank rectified the situation for that month and then again I find out this month I was charged AGAIN. At this point I had emailed multiple emails I was given, cancelled online multiple times and called and spoke to someone at every location with no resolution. I had to contact my bank again and request a new card because it it ridiculous that after multiple forms of communication I am still being charged for something I cant/no longer am using. Beware of getting a membership here because to cancel it is such a nightmare.
Review 2: Me and my wife go here all the time we have a membership Great service,I was wondering is this place the same as the one that just opened on Plainfield street?
Review 3: All of the workers are very nice, I love the energy and the vibes they give. The music is very soothing. And they always do such an amazing job!!! Definitely would recommend all of the ladies that work there!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Review 4: My eye brows are completely different.. I did have a slight difference with the length but not shape previously. I‚Äôve been coming here for a few months because it‚Äôs close to my house.. The technicians are usually okay and usually get the eyebrows fairly similar..but this time is way off.. honestly, I‚Äôll probably never come back again. So disappointed.

name: Salon Thread - The Threading Salon
working_hours: Monday: 10 AM-7 PM, Tuesday: 10 AM-7 PM, Wednesday: 10 AM-7 PM, Thursday: 10 AM-7 PM, Friday: 10 AM-7 PM, Saturday: 10 AM-7 PM, Sunday: Closed
Review 1: Hi ... I am so happy from this place the service I got done from the girl name Mona she did excellent job for my full face . She takes her own time to do the best I told my friends to go to Mona to get the same shape of my eyebrows. Thanks Mona to make me beautiful
Review 2: I absolutely love coming here to get my eyebrows threaded! Out of all the places I have been in the past, Salon Thread is the best one yet, Nilima does an amazing job!!!
Review 3: I have had a monthly membership with this establishment for over a year. At 17 dollars a month, I can go anytime I want, how often I want, and I always get service with a smile. In your membership, you also get free bottled water or cans of soda, plus there is a coffee machine if you so desire. Mona is my preferred eyebrow specialist as she is fantastic and makes sure there is not one hair out of place on my brows. In fact, I usually don't stop there unless I see her car parked outside. Not only does she treat me with respect, but, she also makes me feel welcomed and has this friendly vibe about her. I completely trust her with my eyebrows and that's a big deal to someone like me. I don't go anywhere else for this service! I highly recommend going at least once. I'm usually in an out within 5 minutes and there are so fast I've never spent more than 2 minutes waiting to be seen. If you're a first-timer, request Mona; you won't regret it. Two more things, there is always plenty of parking AND they are kid-friendly. They always address my 7 year old and give him a treat :) 10/10 I highly recommend!
Review 4: Today was my first time going to Threading Spot, Cumberland RI. I am absolutely AMAZED by the work and personality of Nilima. She did beautiful work to my awful eyebrows & treated me with the most respect. I recommend if you visit this location you make sure to see Nilima, you will leave 100% satisfied and wanting to come back!!!
Review 5: Nilima is extremely thorough with her threading techniques. She is receptive to feedback on the areas of focus and areas to avoid. I'm happy with the results after each session and enjoy having my monthly membership at this location as I get quality work done by Nilima while helping me save.

I went for a threading and tint, she was gentle thank God cuz a couple of them... mannn... and she did a okay job on them. tbh there's only one lady that gets my brows exactly the way I like them but I go there like once every couple months just to remind me where to pluck, n I don't see her much so I always forget her name.
Review 4: This place is very clean and tidy! They do a beautiful job with the threading and they come out perfectly even each time! Their pricing is also very fair. I highly recommend!
Review 5: I was reading someone‚Äôs review and I had the exact same experience my eyebrows got messed up two different shapes. Some might ask why do I keep going there; because I went there before and this lady did a great job hope to find her there again. name: Unique Eyebrow Threading
working_hours: Monday: Closed, Tuesday: 10 AM-6 PM, Wednesday: 10 AM-6 PM, Thursday: 10 AM-6 PM, Friday: 10 AM-6 PM, Saturday: 10 AM-6 PM, Sunday: 10 AM-2 PM
Review 1: Completely shocked at how I was just treated by the older woman who works here. I‚Äôm from out of state looking to get my brows done and this place had good reviews. They woman asked what shape and I said please just clean them up and keep them thick as possible. She said your eyebrows are different shape and sizes. Made me feel uncomfortable and not very nice. I said I‚Äôm sorry that‚Äôs how they grow.. she was very condescending. Then when I was done she asked me to look in the mirror and my eyes were watery (as they always are bc I have contacts and holding my eyes) so she asks if she made me cry?? Very odd experience. Then she rung me out- I didn‚Äôt feel like tipping but I gave less than I would have. Will not return. As a small business owner- it would be nice to treat people nicely. Review 2: I love coming here to clean my eyebrows. Very affordable, make sure to bring cash or use an onsite ATM
Review 3: I have been going here for over 10 years. They do an absolutely amazing job. I hate to write negative things on this business because I really do love them but the younger girl needs a little bit more training -it absolutely kills when she threads my eyebrows.
